d1_text:
Npc0658:
ï¿½I expected there to be about a seven percent chance that you would rescue me.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I just thought it was a good opportunity to meet Mr. Saturn.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I also got to meet Dr. Andonuts...[PAUSE 20]  See you.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
[PAUSE 60][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½What?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½You're looking for the book ï¿½Overcoming Shynessï¿½?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I returned it to the Onett library.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Please use the book to help the shy Tenda tribe.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...Anyway,[PAUSE 15] because I knew you, I had an incredible experience... wow![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I was kidnapped by some of Giygas' toadies![HALT][CLR_FLAG EXIT_MOUSE_DISAGREEABLE]
[END]
